mapper.select: select top.id as id, top.state as state, top.create_time as create_time, ttg.id as teaching_group_id, ttg.name as teaching_group_name, tsc.id as secondary_college_id, tsc.name as secondary_college_name, tm.id as major_id, tm.name as major_name, tg.id as grade_id, tg.year as year, tg.number as number, tu.id as user_id, tu.name as user_name, tu.icon as user_icon, tu.phone_number as user_phone_number, tui.email as user_email, tui.address as user_address, tui.sex as user_sex, topd.id as course_id, topd.course_name as course_name, topd.credit as credit, topd.teaching_hours as teaching_hours, topd.weeks_teach as weeks_teach, topd.type as type from tb_opening_plan top left join tb_opening_plan_detail topd on top.id = topd.opening_plan_id left join tb_secondary_college tsc on top.secondary_college_id = tsc.id left join tb_user tu on top.teacher_id = tu.id left join tb_user_info tui on tu.id = tui.user_faculty_id left join tb_teaching_group ttg on top.teaching_group_id = ttg.id left join tb_grade tg on top.grade_id = tg.id left join tb_major tm on tg.major_id = tm.id where top.id=#{id} and top.is_deleted = 0 and topd.is_deleted = 0 and tsc.is_deleted = 0 and tu.is_deleted = 0 and ttg.is_deleted = 0 and tm.is_deleted = 0 and tui.is_deleted = 0
